page_content:
UNITED NATIONS  
SUSTAINABLE  
DEVELOPMENT GOALS
The Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) are a series of interlinked goals 
adopted by UN member states in 2015. These goals focus on creating a 
fairer, more just world with more sustainable economic and environmental 
practices by 2030. The goals are ambitious and will only succeed through 
the combined efforts of government, business and civil society.
As a member of the UN Global Compact, Amyris supports all of the SDGs 
and, recognizing the importance of the goals, we have linked our areas of 
impact to the SDGs. We have prioritized several goals that align with our 
business where we can make a positive impact around the world.
62020 Inaugural ESG Report
